school.name: Mattatuck Valley Community Technical College, Connecticut, USA

education.field_of_study: Practical applications of technology to support organizations

school.name: Instituto Universitario YMCA Lope Mendoza, Caracas , Venezuela

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities:
·To receive and to load the orders in SAP with all aspects like lead time, inco terms (l/c), price validity, packaging, documents, minimum order policy and so on.
·To monitor the order fulfillment process for the designated area of responsibility (geography or customer) and to provide proactive early warning communication on all bottlenecks and potential delays. To be accountable for this communication.
· To liaise closely with all concerned departments to try to resolve any bottleneck whilst keeping the customer fully up to date at all times.
·To build excellent relationships with key contacts both at the customer as within the global TE manufacturing plants.
·To maintain all master data which has been agreed regionally to be the responsibility of the plant customer service.
·Where any orders, quotes, prices or master data not entered into the system correctly or for whatever reason not up to date, to communicate with responsible sales and pricing manager to get this data updated in the system.
·To coordinate all communications between the Customer and TE departments ensuring timely delivery of all related documents for deliveries to the customer.
·To initiate and coordinate customer complaints in a timely matter.
·To coordinate and monitor credit and debit note procedure (financial approval) and issue the respective credit or debit note.
·To receive and monitor order-related customer complaints ensuring that the customer is always given the information they require when they need it.
·To set up/arrange delivery for product samples to the customer.
·To respond to order-related customer inquiries.
·To provide customer open order reports in order to keep the customer updated and informed about the open orders.
·To provide shipment & outstanding delivery reports so that customer can review and track their shipments.
·To initiate/propose improvements.
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Professional

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities:

*Analyze and approve Data and Devices (DND) special price requests, quotations and proposals for the Business Unit.
*Simulate SPR's/RFQ profitability and commercial effects of pricing decisions for DND quotations accross multiple product lines.
*Measure response win rate & performance to identify trends and ensure competitive pricing.
*Improve price request response time and reduce responsiveness variation.
*Improve win rate and deal profitability via willingness to pay analysis , win rate elasticity and competitive variance analysis in order to present competitive pricing on special price request and proposals.
*Work with Business Units pricing teams and Product Managers to implement and monitor the Pricing and Marging develop establishment in GPMS system.
*Use Pricing Software Systems to perform Distributor profitability, price realization,and profit waterfall analysis. Ability to incorporate  these analytics into transactional decisions.
*Assist with pricing and quotation procedure changes and improvements.
*Interact regularly with Sales,Product Management, distributor partners and Customer Care Team.
profile_positions.title: Pricing Analyst

profile_positions.title: Customer Care Professional

profile_positions.description:
•	Order processing on daily bases. 
•	Ensure 100% phone coverage during office hours.
•	Provide reports for customers and sales to improve the budget and service/sales. 
•	Check with financial department the hold/credit status of orders.
•	Complaints, maintenance of orders and cleaning up order book, return issues.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative Spanish- Italian

profile_positions.description:
Office: General maintenance of the office (meeting rooms, kitchen...) and office suppliers (cleaning, office material, food & beverage...).

Personal Assistant: Attend and filter incoming calls, monthly expenses, business cards database maintenance, travel logistic (flight &hotel reservations), agenda follow-up; client and internal meetings, conference calls, restaurant reservations,...
	
Office events & travel: Organize Office Meetings and Local/Office events. Liaising with suppliers, including airlines and hotels, to manage bookings and schedules for specifically events. Prepare monthly report to manage budget, hotel and Air ticket for our consulters. Communication and coordination with implant agency in order to have the best result for the company
profile_positions.title: Office Manager Position

profile_positions.description:
Supervising 20 people and coordinating tasks distribution, internal office administration, coordination with US partner.    

Paradigma’s Breaking Tours concept: a complete vacation package, wit hotel, flights, transfers car rental reservation, operator guided tour and national/international air tickets.
profile_positions.title: Co-owner of the company

profile_positions.description: Coordination activities between Venezuelan branches and the headquarter in Calgary, Canada, post-sales client’s follow up, acting as a Logistic Manager for Venezuela, Colombia and Brazil.
profile_positions.title: Executing a general Marketing & Sales assistant role

profile_positions.description: Reservations to VIP and business people.
profile_positions.title: Business centre coordinator
